mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (user_id, user_pwd, user_name, user_birth, user_email, user_address, user_detailaddress, user_phone, user_state) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userBirth}, #{userEmail}, #{userAddress}, #{userDetailAddress}, #{userPhone}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_pwd, user_name, user_birth, user_email, user_address, user_detailaddress, user_phone FROM USERS WHERE user_id=#{userId}
